headline.main: DR. SEYMOUR URGES DEFENSE OF IDEALS; Yale President Says U.S. 'Ran to Cover' in Neutrality Act

lead_paragraph: GREENWICH, Conn., March 2 -- "Positive action" to defend our ideals of government was urged by Dr. Charles Seymour, president of Yale University, in a talk this afternoon at Christ Protestant Episcopal Church at a special service on behalf of the Greenwich branch of the British War Relief Society.
abstract: Dr C Seymour scores U S neutrality
